title: Charming Navaratna Stone Necklace - A Timeless Addigai
materials: VVS Clarity). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant
features: Delicate floral motif design with CZ diamonds outlining each flower, interspersed with vibrant rubies. Features alternating Emerald and CZ diamond encrusted paisley (Butta) shaped pendants. The central pendant features a teardrop emerald within a diamond halo, adding a focal point of elegance. The flexible design ensures a comfortable fit, perfect for any neckline.
occasions: and special occasions. Also a beautiful choice for modern cocktail parties or any event where you want to add a touch of traditional elegance.
description: This Addigai balances classic South Indian design with contemporary aesthetics. The use of natural gemstones and high-quality CZ diamonds offers luxury at an accessible price. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and ensures lasting beauty. Lightweight and comfortable, making it ideal for extended wear.
